nodes.text: Bbbl was a Northern Mustafarian that lived on Mustafar during the Imperial Era. In 14 BBY. Bbbl was a part of a scouting group sent to locate a crash site near the Gahenn Plains. Upon their arrival, Bbbl and another Mustafarian were killed by the Sith Lord Darth Vader, who used another Mustafarian Sssp as the host body for the spirit of Lord Darth Momin.

Bbbl was a Northern Mustafarian who was a member of a clan on Mustafar led by Father Kkkt. In 14 BBY, Father Kkkt and another Mustafarian, Zzzs, witnessed a fiery object crash near the Gahenn Plains. Concerned, Kkkt sent a scouting party consisting of Bbbl, Sssp, Rrrn, and another Mustafarian to investigate the site.

Upon reaching the supposed crash site the group were befuddled by the supposed lack of any debris. Sssp concluded the object must have landed in one of the lava flows and disintegrated prior to their arrival. As the group turned to report back to Father Kkkt, Bbbl spotted a dark figure through his binoculars. The Mustafarian had no time to react as the shadowy figure launched a boulder at Bbbl, knocking the Mustafarian off the lava flea, and into the lava. In the end Rrrn was the only Mustafarian to survive this encounter with the Sith Lord Darth Vader, making his escape by lava flea while the Sith was occupied with Sssp.

Like other Northern Mustafarians, Bbbl wore armor and a breath mask as protection against Mustafar's environment. While on the search for Vader's crashed ship Bbbl carried a Mustafarian blaster rifle and a pair of binoculars.
Bbbl first appeared in the comic Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 22, written by Charles Soule, illustrated by Giuseppe Camuncoli, and released on October 17 2018.
